sections.title: Role & Context in Vesta FinOps
sections.goal: Understand interviewee's responsibilities, scope of work, and alignment with company mission and values.

sections.title: Budgeting & Forecasting Practices
sections.goal: Explore methods used for setting and monitoring cloud cost budgets and forecasts.
sample_questions: Can you walk me through the process you use to set quarterly cloud budgets under POL-FIN-007?
How do you leverage historical data to improve forecast accuracy?
What tools or dashboards are essential in your forecasting workflow?

sections.title: Guardrails & Policy Enforcement
sections.goal: Investigate how policies like POL-FIN-007 and RFC-1502 are enforced and monitored.
sample_questions: How do you implement resource quotas across different teams without impacting delivery timelines?
Can you give an example where a quota prevented a budget overrun?
How do you communicate policy changes to engineering teams?

sections.title: Cross-Project Dependencies
sections.goal: Understand how Vesta FinOps integrates with other projects and departments.
sample_questions: Can you explain how Vesta FinOps interacts with Quasar Billing for anomaly detection?
What data sources from Nimbus Observability feed into your cost analysis?
How do you reconcile cost data with usage metrics from Helios Datalake?

sections.title: Incident & Risk Management
sections.goal: Discuss handling of cost anomalies, risks, and trade-offs in optimization.
sample_questions: Could you describe a recent incident where idle resource costs spiked unexpectedly?
How did you apply the RB-FIN-007 Idle Resource Reaper in that situation?
What trade-offs do you consider when deciding whether to enforce aggressive scaling down?

sections.title: Future Improvements & Strategic Alignment
sections.goal: Identify potential process improvements and alignment with future business goals.
sample_questions: What upcoming features or processes in Vesta FinOps are you most excited about?
How do you see FinOps evolving to support multi-cloud strategies?
What are the biggest risks to achieving long-term cost optimization goals?
